title: Linear State-Space Control Systems
abstract: Preface. Chapter 1. Introduction. Chapter 2. State-Space Fundamentals. Chapter 3. Controllability. Chapter 4. Observability. Chapter 5. Minimal Realizations. Chapter 6. Stability. Chapter 7. Design of Linear State Feedback Control Laws. Chapter 8. Observers and Observer-Based Compensators. Chapter 9. Introduction To Optimal Control. References. Appendix A. Matrix Introduction. Appendix B. Linear Algebra. Appendix C. Continuing MATLAB Example m-File. References. Index.

tldr.text: The paper discusses the design of Linear State Feedback Control Laws and their applications in MATLAB, as well as some of the examples used in the book, including the one described in the preface.
